projects.title: These are some of my projects
projects.description: I've created web and mobile apps, starting from an idea, going through a UI prototype, laying it out in HTML/CSS and then developing the modules of the app. This is a selection of them.
projects.textMoreProjects: I like to learn and experiment with more technologies in Open Source projects

card_1.title: Brief story
card_1.content: At 13 years old I was fascinated by the Internet and how it worked. I develop my first website and published on Christmas 2015. Over the years, I've learned to code and how to build websites and web applications considering performance and accessibility.

card_2.title: Tech Writing
card_2.content: Then, I started writing about technology, programming, and other topics that I find interesting in DEV. Last year I published Codebase. A newsletter for web development and machine learning.

card_3.title: Work at Start-ups
card_3.content: I've worked at two start-ups as a Software Developer: Blaze and Tutoom. Please check out my LinkedIn profile for more information about how I've contributed to the product development of these companies.

card_4.title: Open-Source Contributor
card_4.content: I love to create and contribute to Open Source projects (Websites, apps, browser extensions, plugins). Currently, I'm working on NASA Open MCT. A web-based mission control framework for visualizing telemetry.

card_5.title: Educative Content Creator
card_5.content: I've two YouTube channels (for English/Spanish-speaking communities). 'Tech and Marcelo' is a channel where I share my knowledge about programming. 'Arte de programar' is a channel where I teach Computer Science concepts with animations and drawings.

card_6.title: Lifelong learner
card_6.content: Graduated in Software Development career. I always try to learn new things and experiment with new technologies. It's the best way to keep up with the fast-paced world. Not everything I learn is related to programming. Space exploration and Aerial Robotics are topics that I love to learn about.

contact.title: Let's create together...
contact.description: Whether you have an offer, a question or just want to say hi
